posts.post_content:
On hold for now. Trying to sell as a lot
I am breaking up my T206 set and have sold most of the graded stuff. I will list the rest here later but for now I have close to 400 commons that I would like to sell. Instead of listing all 400 here I would like to help people fill their lists. Send me a pm with your list and your email and I will let you know what I have. Most of the cards are lower grade. So this is a great way to help get your Monster number up for less money. Mostly commons but some HOF and a couple lower grade variations. 
Thanks!
Eric
Hey Eric, had mentioned to you a while back about the Polar Bears I was searching for... I'll reach out again :)

Putting this on hold until tomorrow. Want to make sure I get all the PMs replies to and waiting on an offer for the whole lot (offer coming tomorrow am). Will let everyone know then if possible get to the lists. Thanks for the replies. 
Eric
